title: SEC to Demand More Transparency From China
itunes:title: SEC to Demand More Transparency From China
description:
Dr. Vino Palli, CEO of MiDoctor Urgent Care, discusses the Covid virus and vaccinations. Businessweek Technology Editor Joshua Brustein talks about his Businessweek Magazine story Afghanistan War Turns a U.S. Military Startup Into a Unicorn. Bloomberg News Financial Regulations Reporter Ben Bain shares the details of his interview with SEC Chair Gary Gensler demanding that Chinese companies trading in U.S. markets better inform investors about political and regulatory risks. And we Drive to the Close with Margie Patel, Senior Portfolio Manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. 

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
